title: 游戏经常玩一会就崩溃
author: 枫糖浆丶
txt_content:
报错文件在这







crash-2020-02-26_22.02.36-client.txt


2020-2-26 22:05 上传
点击文件名下载附件




31.99 KB, 下载次数: 19

replies.author: 地球照样转
replies.txt_content:
Forestry : Warning: You have mods that change the behavior of Minecraft, ForgeModLoader, and/or Minecraft Forge to your client: 
Optifine
你是否安装了林业mod?
尝试删除林业

replies.author: 枫糖浆丶
replies.txt_content: 删除了林业，新开的地图还是崩溃，再次进入存档就直接崩溃

replies.txt_content:

replies.txt_content: 建议删除部分占内存过多的模组
